title: Tangem Wallet — Hardware Wallet For Your Crypto
description: Tangem Wallet lets you store your crypto assets secure and easily accessible while keeping private keys contained in your card.

backup.title: Ultra secure backup
backup.description: You can connect up to three cards to one wallet, so you'll always have a way to use your wallet if your main card is lost, stolen, or damaged.

mobile.description: No wires or batteries. Just download the Tangem app to your phone and tap the card.

company.title: Company
company.description: Tangem is a high-tech company in the blockchain sector was founded in 2017, headquartered in Zug, Switzerland, with branches in North America, Eastern Europe, and APAC.
company.quote: Tangem Wallet is the last mile between 8 billion people and the Crypto World.
company.about-1: Tangem started with the idea of bringing cryptocurrencies to the masses using a unique combination of a smartcard-based hardware wallet and mobile applications.
company.about-2: Company owns and promotes the technology of hardware cold-wallet for crypto assets with secure and simple UX in 170 countries today. Our customers enjoy setup time within 1 minute with the ultimate security level for crypto assets on their wallet. Tangem solutions offer multi-support of a growing number of thousadns of tokens by a single wallet.

items.question: What is a Tangem Wallet?
items.answer: Tangem Wallet is the safest hardware wallet in the world. Tangem Wallet keeps your Bitcoin, Ethereum, and more than 1000 additional cryptocurrencies completely safe. The card is the key to your wallet, and using your funds requires taping the card to your phone.

items.question: What can I do with Tangem Wallet?
items.answer: Tangem Wallet allows you to buy and sell cryptocurrencies using Apple Pay, Google Pay and credit cards. Additionally, it has access to hundreds of decentralized services, which allow trading on exchanges, issuing loans, borrowing funds, working with NFTs and much more.

items.question: Where are the keys to my wallet kept?
items.answer: The wallet's keys are generated and stored in the card as the top secret. For any operations with your wallet, you will need one of the cards connected to it.

items.question: What happens if I lose the card?
items.answer: Tangem Wallet allows connecting up to 3 cards to a single wallet. All 3 cards are equal in capabilities and can be used with your wallet. To protect your wallet from unauthorized access, you can also set an access code for your card. If you forget the access code, you can restore it with an additional previously connected card.

items.question: How reliable and safe is it?
items.answer: Tangem Wallet is the most safe and reliable crypto wallet in the world. The chip in your card is a microcomputer. It has been certified by Common Criteria at EAL6+ level — the same level of chip protection used in passports. It is completely safe from dust, water, and hacking attempts. The card reliably performs in temperatures between -25℃ (-13.℉) and +55℃ (131℉), with the chip useful life beyond 25 years of service.

buy.title: Buy Tangem wallet
buy.description: Choose your multicurrency hardware wallet to manage various crypto with access to DeFi, NFT, DeEx and more – all in one card.

pack3.title: Pack of 3 Cards
pack3.description: For the best security, there are 3 Tangem cards to one wallet. Ultimate backup!

pack2.title: Pack of 2 Cards
pack2.description: 2 Tangem cards to one wallet. One for you, one for backup!
